info.title: NetworkManagementClient
info.description: The Microsoft Azure Network management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Microsoft Azure Networks service to manage your network resources. The API has entities that capture the relationship between an end user and the Microsoft Azure Networks service.

get.description: Gets all network interfaces in a virtual machine scale set.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualMachineScaleSetName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual machine scale set.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of NetworkInterface resources.

schema.description: Response for the ListNetworkInterface API service call.

get.description: Gets information about all network interfaces in a virtual machine in a virtual machine scale set.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualMachineScaleSetName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual machine scale set.

parameters.name: virtualmachineIndex
parameters.description: The virtual machine index.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of NetworkInterface resources.

schema.description: Response for the ListNetworkInterface API service call.

get.description: Get the specified network interface in a virtual machine scale set.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualMachineScaleSetName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual machine scale set.

parameters.name: virtualmachineIndex
parameters.description: The virtual machine index.

parameters.name: networkInterfaceName
parameters.description: The name of the network interface.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expands referenced resources.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting NetworkInterface resource.

schema.description: A network interface in a resource group.

get.description: Get the specified network interface ip configuration in a virtual machine scale set.

parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualMachineScaleSetName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual machine scale set.

parameters.name: virtualmachineIndex

parameters.name: networkInterfaceName
parameters.description: The name of the network interface.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expands referenced resources.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the list of resulting NetworkInterfaceIPConfigurations resources.

schema.description: Response for list ip configurations API service call.

get.description: Get the specified network interface ip configuration in a virtual machine scale set.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualMachineScaleSetName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual machine scale set.

parameters.name: virtualmachineIndex
parameters.description: The virtual machine index.

parameters.name: networkInterfaceName
parameters.description: The name of the network interface.

parameters.name: ipConfigurationName
parameters.description: The name of the ip configuration.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expands referenced resources.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting NetworkInterfaceIPConfiguration resource.
